category-def.name: de.uni_hildesheim.sse.easy_producer.core_category
category-def.label: EASy Producer
category-def.description: The features of this category provide the core functionalities of the EASy Producer tool, a software product line engineering tool for the easy development of large-scale, multi-software product lines. This category also includes the optional but recommended user interface for EASy Producer.

category-def.name: de.uni_hildesheim.sse.easy_producer.reasoning_category
category-def.label: EASy Producer Reasoning
category-def.description: The features of this category provide the reasoning functionalities of the EASy Producer tool, a software product line engineering tool for the easy development of large-scale, multi-software product lines. In order to perform validity checks on variability models, at least one of the features must be selected.

category-def.name: de.uni_hildesheim.sse.easy_producer.instantiation_category
category-def.label: EASy Producer Instantiation
category-def.description: The features of this category provide the instantiation functionalities of the EASy Producer tool, a software product line engineering tool for the easy development of large-scale, multi-software product lines. In order to perform artifact instantiations, the core feature and one of the instantiator features must be selected.

category-def.name: de.uni_hildesheim.sse.easy_producer.integration_category
category-def.label: EASy Producer Integration (Core)
category-def.description: The features of this category provide the core functionality for the integration of external tools with the EASy Producer tool, a software product line engineering tool for the easy development of large-scale, multi-software product lines. In order to integrate EASy Producer with other tools, select the corresponding feature (typically, the feature has the same name as the tool to integrate with).

category-def.name: de.uni_hildesheim.sse.easy_producer.quick_install_category
category-def.label: Quick Installation of EASy Producer
category-def.description: The single feature of this category provides all required plug-ins for an easy installation of EASy Producer. However, if you prefer a custom installation, please use the other EASy categories to select your desired plug-ins.
